structure.unit: ARTICLE XXII. PERSONAL INJURY PROTECTION MEDICAL PROVIDERS

text.section:
Sec. 8A-430. Service of Notice.
Any notice required by this article shall be in writing and sent by certified mail or by regular mail if notice is returned undelivered or unclaimed, to the mailing address set forth on the application for the PIP Medical Provider registration. The mailing address set forth in the application shall be presumed the correct mailing address.
